 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂטָה‎</span>] **verb** ==turn aside== (Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎סְטָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***id.***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׂטָא‎</span> ***stray***; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> III. ***be seduced***, etc.; cf [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]<sup>JPhil. xi (1882), 205</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 2 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂטִית‎</span> [[Num.5.19|Num 5:19]]; [[Num.5.20|Num 5:20]] ***Imperfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּשְׂטֶה‎</span> v[[Num.5.12|Num 5:12]] v[[Num.5.29|Num 5:29]], jussive 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֵשְׂטְ‎</span> [[Prov.7.25|Prov 7:25]] ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׂטֵה‎</span> [[Prov.4.15|Prov 4:15]] — ***turn aside***, of unfaithful wife [[Num.5.12|Num 5:12]] (absolute), + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּחַת אִישׁ‎</span>, i.e. while married, v[[Num.5.19|Num 5:19]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎טֻמְאָה‎</span> adverb accusative), v[[Num.5.20|Num 5:20]] v[[Num.5.29|Num 5:29]] (all [[BDB#P|P]]); of youth, from (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעַל‎</span>) way of evil woman [[Prov.4.15|Prov 4:15]], toward (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span>) her ways [[Prov.7.25|Prov 7:25]].
